scripts.kill-port-3000: lsof -ti:3000 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || echo 'Port 3000 is already free'
scripts.kill-port-8000: lsof -ti:8000 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || echo 'Port 8000 is already free'
scripts.kill-all-ports: npm run kill-port-3000 && npm run kill-port-8000
scripts.start-server: npm run kill-port-8000 && cd server && python3 -m uvicorn main:app --reload --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000
scripts.dev: npm run kill-all-ports && echo 'Starting development servers...'
scripts.clean: npm run kill-all-ports && cd client && npm run build
